content.title: Real-World Example: BTC Long Trade
content.introduction: A trader enters a long position on BTC at $40,000 and sells at $44,000. The $4,000 difference is their profit, minus any fees.
steps: Trader sells BTC, making a $4,000 profit (minus fees).
content.keyTakeaway: Profit is made by buying low and selling high.
content.funFact: The largest single-day BTC gain was over 20%!
content.teacherNote: Always consider trading fees and market volatility.
